name: Monad 华语社群
fullText:
Monad Foundation 收购了 @portal_hq！🔥

Portal 是一个稳定币基础设施平台，让任何企业、银行或金融机构都能轻松接入稳定币支付，目前每天处理的结算金额高达数百万美元 

更多收购详情请看下方👇 https://t.co/aB1NJlJZIB

name: Monad ⨀
fullText:
Monad Foundation has acquired @portal_hq 

Portal’s stablecoin infrastructure platform allows any business, bank, or financial institution to accept stablecoin payments - currently powering millions of dollars in daily settlements.

Read more on the acquisition below ⤵️ https://t.co/9GSK6YsfqK

name: allincrypto 熬鹰资本 🇨🇳
fullText:
多以太了，这里加满5x多了。
狠狠拿突破单！
让我两头损了这么多天，该我吃肉了！
